metadata.name: CreateDump Process Dump
metadata.comment: Detects uses of the createdump.exe LOLOBIN utility to dump process memory

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\createdump.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('fx_ver_internalname_str') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -u ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' --full ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -f ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' --name ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.dmp '))))

output.summary: Detects uses of the createdump.exe LOLOBIN utility to dump process memory

metadata.objective: False positive: Command lines that use the same flags References: https://www.crowdstrike.com/blog/overwatch-exposes-aquatic-panda-in-possession-of-log-4-shell-exploit-tools/, https://twitter.com/bopin2020/status/1366400799199272960
